name: Enhansen
description: EnHansen Performance works with leaders, sales professionals and individuals to transform performance by using the Neuroscience of Leadership, Neuromarketing and Executive Coaching. It draws on the Neuroscience of Leadership and Emotional Intelligence research to provide managers with tangible facts and strategies on becoming an effective leader and producing high performance teams.
features: PRISM Brain Mapping (world’s first neuroscience-based online assessment tool)
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Transforming Managers & Individuals into Agile Leaders of Change & Performance
ShortDescription: EnHansen Performance provides leadership, sales and performance solutions using the latest neuroscience research. We have proven strategies to “EMPOWER, PERSUADE and PERFORM with the BRAIN in mind”.
enhanced_description: EnHansen Performance transforms managers and individuals into agile leaders of change and performance, leveraging the Neuroscience of Leadership, Neuromarketing, and Executive Coaching. The product provides leadership, sales, and performance solutions, drawing on Neuroscience of Leadership and Emotional Intelligence research to offer tangible facts and strategies for effective leadership and producing high-performance teams. It employs proven strategies to empower, persuade, and perform, all with the brain in mind.
key_use_cases: Conducting neuroscience-based online assessments (PRISM Brain Mapping)
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
Building a more diverse and inclusive workforce
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Leverages Neuroscience of Leadership and Emotional Intelligence research for practical strategies
Utilizes PRISM Brain Mapping, described as the world’s first neuroscience-based online assessment tool
Focuses on brain-centric strategies for empowerment, persuasion, and performance
technology_stack: Neuroscience-based online assessment tool (PRISM Brain Mapping)
roi_benefits: Accelerated Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Boosted Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
